ygData.subject: RE: Need more bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Although I d love to - I can t take the credit -- I was the one whining about clerics not symbol buffing everyone and said parties should pay clerics so they
ygData.messageBody:
Although I'd love to - I can't take the credit -- I was the one whining
about clerics not symbol buffing everyone and said parties should pay
clerics so they don't worry about costs -- I do think it was Rokken (or
Talies? or John?) who provided the tip of just supplying the gems.

BTW - not just clerics but enchanters can give you a Ruin buff that use gems
as reagents. My mid 30ish enchanter friend was quite happy when I put 20
jaspers in his trade screen. And I was quite happy to see "a clops hits YOU
but your magical skin absorbs the blow" - saves that first bub (absorbs the
first 250 hps I think) getting fear to stick for the opening of the fight.

Sylly

p.s. I was looking for a clops/hg/grifon to pull and decides to clean some
trash 'fawns. ack I'm using up my magical skin on a greenie! and then
when I looted him -- hehe - yup he dropped a jasper!


-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Monday, December 20, 1999 1:12 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Need more bards

From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

Another thing - I think it was Sylly a few days back who
mentioned carrying
Jasper and Peridot around with her for the Clerics in her
groups. I started
doing this, and when I hand them over to the Cleric and
everyone gets
Symboled you'd think *I* was the Cleric. Man. If you wanna
be popular with
groups carry Symbol reagents appropriate to your level
around with you.
Very good tip Sylly.
